verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
There is none like You, Lord
Jesus, You're beautiful

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Spirit of wisdom, open my eyes again
Spirit of revelation, open my heart again
Spirit of wisdom, open my eyes again
Spirit of revelation, open my heart again

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines:
'Cause I wanna see
Lord, I wanna see
See You rightly, Jesus

verse.name: v1d
verse.lines:
I know that Your eyes are like flames of fire
I know that Your head is white as wool
I know that Your voice, it sounds like wat–µrs
Jesus, You're beautiful

verse.name: v1e
verse.lines:
There is noone like You
in the heavens or on the earth
